00026 AddressBlock::AddressBlock(QDomNode &memoryMapNode):
00027 MemoryMapItem(memoryMapNode),
00028 range_(), rangeAttributes_(), width_(0), widthAttributes_(),
00029 memoryBlockData_(0), registerData_() {
00030 
00031         // the temporary variables to store the parsed values for memoryBlockData_
00032         General::Usage usage = General::RESERVED;
00033         General::BooleanValue volatileValue = General::BOOL_UNSPECIFIED;
00034         General::Access access = General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS;
00035         QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> > tempParameters;
00036 
00037         for (int i = 0; i < memoryMapNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00038 
00039                 QDomNode tempNode = memoryMapNode.childNodes().at(i);
00040 
00041                 // get range
00042                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:range")) {
00043                         range_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00044 
00045                         // get attributes
00046                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, rangeAttributes_);
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 // get width
00050                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:width")) {
00051                         width_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00052 
00053                         // get attributes
00054                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, widthAttributes_);
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 // get usage
00058                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:usage")) {
00059                         usage = General::str2Usage(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue(),
00060                                         General::UNSPECIFIED_USAGE);
00061                 }
00062 
00063                 // get volatile
00064                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:volatile")) {
00065                         QString volatileStr = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00066                         volatileValue = General::str2BooleanValue(volatileStr);
00067                 }
00068 
00069                 // get access
00070                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:access")) {
00071                         access = General::str2Access(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).
00072                                         nodeValue(), General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS);
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 // get parameters
00076                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00077 
00078                         // go through all parameters
00079                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00080 
00081                                 QDomNode parameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00082                                 Parameter *temp = new Parameter(parameterNode);
00083                                 tempParameters.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(temp));
00084                         }
00085                 }
00086                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:register")) {
00087                         registerData_.append(QSharedPointer<Register>(
00088                                         new Register(tempNode)));
00089                 }
00090                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:registerFile")) {
00091                         registerData_.append(QSharedPointer<RegisterFile>(
00092                                         new RegisterFile(tempNode)));
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00096         // parsing information is over so save the values to memoryBlockData
00097         memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>(
00098                         new MemoryBlockData(usage, volatileValue, access, tempParameters));
00099         tempParameters.clear();
00100 
00101         // if the mandatory elements were not found
00102         if (range_.isNull() || width_ < 1) {
00103                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr(
00104                                 "AddressBlock: invalid AddressBlock element found"));
00105                 return;
00106         }
00107 }

00109 AddressBlock::AddressBlock( const AddressBlock &other ):
00110 MemoryMapItem(other),
00111 range_(other.range_), 
00112 rangeAttributes_(other.rangeAttributes_),
00113 width_(other.width_),
00114 widthAttributes_(other.widthAttributes_),
00115 memoryBlockData_(),
00116 registerData_() {
00117 
00118         if (other.memoryBlockData_) {
00119                 memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>(
00120                         new MemoryBlockData(*other.memoryBlockData_.data()));
00121         }
00122 
00123         foreach (QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> regModel, other.registerData_) {
00124                 if (regModel) {
00125                         QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> copy = QSharedPointer<RegisterModel>(
00126                                 new RegisterModel(*regModel.data()));
00127                         registerData_.append(copy);
00128                 }
00129         }
00130 }
00131 
00132 AddressBlock & AddressBlock::operator=( const AddressBlock &other ) {
00133         if (this != &other) {
00134                 MemoryMapItem::operator=(other);
00135                 range_ = other.range_;
00136                 rangeAttributes_ = other.rangeAttributes_;
00137                 width_ = other.width_;
00138                 widthAttributes_ = other.widthAttributes_;
00139 
00140                 if (other.memoryBlockData_) {
00141                         memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>(
00142                                 new MemoryBlockData(*other.memoryBlockData_.data()));
00143                 }
00144                 else 
00145                         memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>();
00146 
00147                 registerData_.clear();
00148                 foreach (QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> regModel, other.registerData_) {
00149                         if (regModel) {
00150                                 QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> copy = QSharedPointer<RegisterModel>(
00151                                         new RegisterModel(*regModel.data()));
00152                                 registerData_.append(copy);
00153                         }
00154                 }
00155         }
00156         return *this;
00157 }

00159 AddressBlock::~AddressBlock() {
00160         memoryBlockData_.clear();

00163 void AddressBlock::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00164         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:addressBlock");
00165 
00166         // call base class write() to write the base class info
00167         MemoryMapItem::write(writer);
00168 
00169         if (range_.isEmpty()) {
00170                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element range missing in "
00171                                 "spirit:addressBlock"));
00172         }
00173         else {
00174                 // start the spirit:range element
00175                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:range");
00176 
00177                 // write the attributes for the element
00178                 General::writeAttributes(writer, rangeAttributes_);
00179 
00180                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00181                 writer.writeCharacters(range_);
00182                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:range
00183         }
00184 
00185         if (width_ == 0) {
00186                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element width missing in "
00187                                 "spirit:addressBlock"));
00188         }
00189         else {
00190                 // start the spirit:width tag
00191                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:width");
00192 
00193                 // write the attributes for the element
00194                 General::writeAttributes(writer, widthAttributes_);
00195 
00196                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00197                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(width_));
00198                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:width
00199         }
00200 
00201         // if optional memoryBlockData instance is found
00202         if (memoryBlockData_) {
00203                 memoryBlockData_->write(writer);
00204         }
00205 
00206         for (int i = 0; i < registerData_.size(); ++i) {
00207                 registerData_.at(i)->write(writer);
00208         }
00209 
00210         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:addressBlock
00211 }
